author: gstein
msg: Alter the signature of svn_wc__db_op_mark_resolved() to allow it to mark
(clear) different types of conflicts on the specified node. Implement it
for text and property conflicts. Then use it in a few places to clear out
RESOLVED_TREE parameters to indicate which conflict states to clear
(attempt_deletion): adjust the semantics a bit: allow a NULL value for
the BASE_NAME parameter. only set the WAS_PRESENT OUT parameter if we
(resolve_conflict_on_node): adjust logic for tracking which conflict
files were found and cleared. rewrite the clearing of the conflict
markesr using the new wc_db function.
(log_do_committed): clear out the conflict markers using the new wc_db
(maybe_remove_conflict): helper function to possibly remove a conflict
(run_revert): remove a bunch of code that was factored out into
maybe_remvoe_conflict. BUGFIX: now it properly removes the merge_file.
use the new wc_db API to clear the resolved states.

author: gstein
msg: Delete a changelist from a node using the wc_db API rather than the old
(fold_entry): remove section that modifies the changelist

author: gstein
msg: Constify a number of the parameters in the commit functions.
Note: we can add const to parameters in the API because it doesn't change
the signature -- it just tells the caller we're going to be doing less
with the values than we may have before.
parameters. do a slight dance if we have to convert an entry's digest
const to the internal checksum localvar.
svn_wc_process_committed): add const to the wcprop_changes param
